title: March 24 this year at. 4.23, there was a violation of Polish airspace by one of the cruise missiles launched this night by lo...
content: March 24 this year at. 4.23, there was a violation of Polish airspace by one of the cruise missiles launched this night by long-range aviation of the Russian Federation. The targets of the strikes were towns in western Ukraine - it was reported. The missile stayed over Poland for 39 seconds and was monitored by military radar systems the entire time.
author: Live UA Map
